day

Object

Defined in addon/components/tt-calendar-weekrow-day.js:33

This should be passed into the component. It should be an Ember.Object with date, month, and year properties.

Ember.Object.create({ date: 31, month: 11, year: 2014 });

Number private

Defined in addon/components/tt-calendar-weekrow-day.js:58

today

Boolean private

Defined in addon/components/tt-calendar-weekrow-day.js:76

Computed property. True if day is today.

weekend

Boolean private

Defined in addon/components/tt-calendar-weekrow-day.js:89

Computed property. True if day is a weekend.
